text: What does the full stack development do?

Full-stack development is a term used to describe the skills and expertise required to design, build, and maintain the front-end and back-end of a web application or software system. A full-stack developer is someone who has a broad range of skills and can handle all aspects of software development, from the client-side (front-end) to the server-side (back-end).

AI engineering is a field of engineering that focuses on the design, development, and deployment of artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML) systems. AI engineers are responsible for building and maintaining AI-powered systems that can perform tasks such as image and speech recognition, natural language processing, and predictive modeling.
